SEARCH
Package de.edux.augmentation.core

Schnittstelle AugmentationSequence

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
CompositeAugmentationSequence
public interface AugmentationSequence
Defines a sequence of image augmentation operations.

This interface represents a sequence of augmentation operations that can be applied to images. It allows for both the application of augmentations to a single image and the execution of the augmentation sequence on a batch of images located in a directory.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    BufferedImage
    applyTo(BufferedImage image)
    Applies the augmentation sequence to a single image.
    AugmentationSequence
    run(String directoryPath, int numberOfWorkers, String outputPath)
    Executes the augmentation sequence on a set of images in a specified directory.

  • Methodendetails

    • applyTo

      BufferedImage applyTo(BufferedImage image)
      Applies the augmentation sequence to a single image.

      This method takes a BufferedImage and applies the defined sequence of augmentation operations to it, returning the augmented image.

      Parameter:
      image - The image to which the augmentation sequence will be applied.
      Gibt zurück:
      The augmented image as a BufferedImage.

    • run

      AugmentationSequence run(String directoryPath, int numberOfWorkers, String outputPath) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Executes the augmentation sequence on a set of images in a specified directory.

      This method applies the augmentation sequence to each image in the specified directory, using a specified number of workers for parallel processing. The augmented images are then saved to the given output path.

      Parameter:
      directoryPath - The path of the directory containing the images to augment.
      numberOfWorkers - The number of worker threads to use for parallel processing.
      outputPath - The path where the augmented images will be saved.
      Gibt zurück:
      The AugmentationSequence instance for method chaining or further operations.
      Löst aus:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the reading or writing of images.
      InterruptedException - If the thread execution is interrupted during processing.
